content:
设答案为 $g$，则显然 $p$ 必须被 $g^n$ 整除。对 $p$ 分解质因数，$p=\prod{a_i}^{c_i}$，最大化 $g$ 则显然令 $g=\prod{a_i}^{\left\lfloor\frac{c_i}{n}\right\rfloor}$。

```python
from collections import *
from math import *
n, p = map(int, input().split())
c = Counter()
for i in range(2, int(p**0.5) + 1):
    while p % i == 0:
        p //= i
        c[i] += 1
if p > 1:
    c[p] += 1
print(prod(k**(v // n) for k, v in c.items()))
```
name: andyli
title: AT_caddi2018_a Product and GCD 题解

name: RainFestival
title: 题解 AT4558 【Product and GCD】
